mapper.select: SELECT A.USERID as userId, A.CUST_CODE as custCode, B.CUST_NAME as cust_name, A.EMPNO as empno, A.EMP_NAME as emp_name, A.DEPART , A.POSITION , A.ZIP_NO , A.ADDR , A.TEL_NO as tel_no, A.FEX_NO , A.HAND_PHONE as hand_phone, A.EMAIL as email, A.RMK , A.USE_YN as use_yn, A.ADMIN , B.HOMEPAGE as homePage, A.HAS_EMAIL as hasEmail, A.HAS_PHONE as hasPhone FROM N_TCNT01_EMP A, TCNT01 B WHERE A.CUST_CODE = B.CUST_CODE AND USERID= #{custCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE N_TCNT01_EMP SET emp_name = #{emp_name}, email = #{email}, hand_phone = #{hand_phone}, has_email = #{hasEmail}, has_phone= #{hasPhone} WHERE USERID = #{userId}
